entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:47 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
